Kenosha.Mary D. Bradford High School:
Bradford High School is a high school located in Kenosha, Wisconsin that serves students in grades 9 to 12. It is the primary high school for students on the north side of the city.


== History ==
Bradford High School was named after Mary D. Bradford, who was Superintendent of Schools for the Kenosha school system from 1878 to 1894, and again from 1910 to 1921.
